superDomainName.x-prompt: Input the name of the superDomain to which a util lib should be added. E.g. 'neurology'. Do not prepend with '/libs/'.

subDomainName.x-prompt: Input the name of shared subdomain to which a lib should be added. E.g. 'auth' or 'ui'. Do not prepend with 'libs/' or 'shared/'.

libName.x-prompt: Input the name of the lib, e.g. 'data-access' or 'buttons'. Do not prepend with domain or subdomain.

allowedSubDomains.x-prompt: (Optional) add other shared subdomains, that this lib can depend upon. Write multiple subdomains comma separated.
